subject: [Mhln] OEM vs Retail Version
body:
Let us move from the era of confrontation to the era of negotiation.

It is only too easy to make suggestions and later try to escape the consequences of what we say.

Sometimes the best, and only effective, way to kill an idea is to put it into practice.

The true source of cheerfulness is benevolence.

How you measure the performance of your managers directly affects the way they act.

Nothing is so strongly fortified that it cannot be taken by money.

We are all the President's men.

The ideal has many names, and beauty is but one of them.

Life would be tolerable but for its amusements.

Glory is fleeting, but obscurity is forever.

Many ideas are good for a limited time -- not forever.

A big man has no time really to do anything but just sit and be big.

Action is the highest perfection and drawing forth of the utmost power, vigor, and activity of man's nature.
